text: DON'T MISS 'Keep up the good work': TOWIE's Gemma Collins stuns fans with her remarkable weight loss as she flaunts her new figure in a series of skintight ensembles 'That bikini's almost gone!' Lee Carter leaves Whitney and Walford, pushing her ever closer to his father. For now Danny Dyer seemed more worried about foxes and weasels taking over EastEnders, by Jim Shelley Jennifer Garner and daughter Seraphina brave the storms in LA... as divorce from Ben Affleck looms The lookalike duo both donned rain boots 'I'm finding my inner Dingle': Sally Dexter reveals how she's relished swapping the chilly glamour of Poldark for her chatty, catty role on Emmerdale What happens when two female colleagues hate each other - and one thinks the other's after her job? Real life Hollywood wife!
